search.name: HotScripts.com
search.description:
Search for code snippets in a multitude of programming languages. Searches all languages by default.
Switches:
/new - New listings
/asp - ASP
/c - C and C++
/java - Java
/javascript - JavaScript
/php - PHP
/perl - Perl
/python - Python
/remotehosts - Remote Hosts
/tools - Tools and Utilities
/xml - XML
Example:
hs parse /javascript
